title: 13 Abercrombie Jeans TikTok Is Obsessed With Right Now
description: You can never have enough pairs of comfortable and stylish jeans, and as shopping editors, we're always on the hunt for the best ones. TikTok has been obsessed with Abercrombie's assortment of jeans for quite some time. In fact, the brand gained a whole new crop of fans and admirers after they spotted the brand's Curve Love straight jeans on Francia Raísa's character in "How I Met Your Father." Even our editors are fans of the brand's wardrobe essentials and the new NFL collection, both of which pair beautifully with the brand's denim lineup. If you want to try these fan-favorite jeans for yourself, we curated some of the top styles you need in your closet. Standout denim styles include the editor-backed '90s straight jeans and mom jeans. The Curve Love collection is also on sale and it has an additional two inches at the hips and thighs, giving you a comfortable yet figure-flattering look that hugs your curves in all the right places. Each pair comes in a variety of washes and designs, too. Whether you're in the market for a crisscross waistband or a distressed look, the list ahead includes all the latest denim trends. These styles also accommodate height with length options ranging from extra short to long. Ahead, you can shop our favorite denim shorts and timeless jeans from Abercrombie. Some washes and styles are on sale too, so stock up while you can! Related: 27 Stylish Picks We're Currently Eyeing From Abercrombie
author: Anvita Reddy
excerpt: Shop our favorite styles from Abercrombie.
text: AbercrombiePhoto Illustration: Aly LimAbercrombiePhoto Illustration: Aly LimWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. In fact, the brand gained a whole new crop of fans and admirers after they spotted the brand's Curve Love straight jeans on Francia Raísa's character in "How I Met Your Father." Even our editors are fans of the brand's wardrobe essentials and the new NFL collection, both of which pair beautifully with the brand's denim lineup. If you want to try these fan-favorite jeans for yourself, we curated some of the top styles you need in your closet. Standout denim styles include the editor-backed '90s straight jeans and mom jeans. The Curve Love collection is also on sale and it has an additional two inches at the hips and thighs, giving you a comfortable yet figure-flattering look that hugs your curves in all the right places. Each pair comes in a variety of washes and designs, too. Whether you're in the market for a crisscross waistband or a distressed look, the list ahead includes all the latest denim trends. These styles also accommodate height with length options ranging from extra short to long. Ahead, you can shop our favorite denim shorts and timeless jeans from Abercrombie. Some washes and styles are on sale too, so stock up while you can! abercrombie.comAbercrombie High-Rise ShortsAbercrombie High Rise 4" Mom Short ($50, originally $60) Available in two denim washes, these mom shorts are perfect for any upcoming vacations. They have a four-inch inseam, which is a flattering length for most heights that strikes a perfect balance between short and long. These shorts are versatile enough to dress up or down so you can wear them at the beach or at brunch.abercrombie.comAbercrombie High-Rise Dad ShortsAbercrombie Curve Love High Rise Dad Short ($53, originally $70) If you're looking for something a little longer, these stylish Dad Shorts offer a more relaxed fit with a five-inch inseam. They're available in three denim washes, ranging from light to medium. Pair them with a classic bodysuit, a basic tank or vest top, and layer it with an open button down.abercrombie.comAbercrombie Flared JeansAbercrombie High Rise Vintage Flare Jean ($72, originally $90) Add drama to your denim arsenal with this High Rise Vintage Flare Jean that comes in two washes. These trendy '70s-inspired jeans have a high-rise waistband that is not only flattering, but also helps to elongate the legs. The flared bottoms pair wonderfully with classic sneakers, heels, and booties.abercrombie.comAbercrombie Low-Rise Baggy JeansAbercrombie Curve Love Low Rise Baggy Jean ($72, originally $90-$110) In the market for a flattering pair of low-rise jeans? These have a comfortable, looser fit that feels flexible rather than restricting. Since it's part of Abercrombie's Curve Love line, the jeans will have a figure-hugging fit that eliminates the waist gap. You can style the light-wash denim with a form-fitting bodysuit, a casual cropped T-shirt, or an effortless tank. But, it also comes in a ton of different washes and styles (some of which are discounted).abercrombie.comAbercrombie Mom JeansAbercrombie Curve Love High Rise Mom Jean ($72, originally $90) These Curve Love High Rise Mom Jeans are the ones everyone is talking about, and a bestseller. They're made with a vintage stretch denim, so they'll retain their shape and still feel like classic denim. They're also easy to style and so on trend. You can get them in three washes.abercrombie.comAbercrombie Maternity JeansAbercrombie Maternity Ankle Straight Jean ($89) Finding a pair of maternity jeans that are comfortable without compromising on style is a challenge. This straight jean from Abercrombie has an elastic belly band that helps the fit adjust with your bump as it grows. These jeans are available in a variety of washes and styles, including distressed designs. Get these in extra short, short, regular, and long lengths as well.PS Photography | Macy Cate WilliamsAbercrombie High-Rise Straight-Leg JeansAbercrombie Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean ($90) The Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean is perfect for that effortless '90s look. These jeans are an editor favorite for good reason — they sit at your waist and have a built-in stretch that feels comfortable. It comes in a variety of trendy styles like medium with criss-cross waistband, dark destroy, light with vent hem, light with carpenter details, grey, and more. The price varies by style and shade. Editor Quote:: "I appreciate that these jeans remain supportive (without being restrictive!) throughout the entire wear," one PS editor wrote. The versatile jean can be dressed up or down and comes in a ton of different washes and styles. Read our in-depth review of the Abercrombie Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean.abercrombie.comAbercrombie Loose JeansAbercrombie & Fitch High Rise Loose Jean ($90) Made with a lightweight, rigid denim, these high-rise jeans are inspired by the effortless look of the early aughts. These will deliver an elongated look that's flattering in all the right places. Although they aren't stretchy, these jeans feature a relaxed fit at the waist and hips, as well as a looser leg shape. They come in a wide range of denim washes. abercrombie.comAbercrombie Flattering Curve Love JeansAbercrombie Curve Love Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean ($90) These are the exact jeans Francia Raisa wore in "How I Met Your Father," and they're trending on TikTok. The Curve Love Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jeans are exceptionally flattering and comfortable. These jeans have an extra two inches through the hip and thigh to help prevent a waist gap. Get them in a variety of washes and styles, including ones with vent hems or a distressed look.abercrombie.comAbercrombie Mid-Rise Straight JeansAbercrombie Curve Love Mid Rise 90s Straight Jean ($90) A straight jean is a wardrobe staple, and the Curve Love Mid Rise 90s Straight Jean provides comfort with built-in stretch. These mid-rise jeans sit right below the waist, making them ideal for tucked-in shirts and basic tanks and T-shirts. It's available in an array denim washes, ideal for daytime outfits. Pricing reflects the style and shade.abercrombie.comAbercrombie '90s Relaxed JeansAbercrombie High Rise 90s Relaxed Jean ($90-$110) Want to keep up with all the latest trends? These High Rise 90s Relaxed Jeans are worth adding to your collection. They're loose almost throughout the jean, and we love the clean look of this pair. They're made of Abercrombie's vintage stretch denim, which has just a little bit of give yet manages to maintain the tougher, more rigid feel of vintage denim.abercrombie.comAbercrombie High-Rise Skinny JeansAbercrombie Curve Love High Rise Skinny Jean ($90) If you'll never part with your skinny jeans, these Curve Love High Rise Skinny Jeans are the ones worth wearing. Tuck them into tall boots for an elegant, vintage look that seems to be popping up lately. You can shop this style in a wide range of washes like medium destroy, medium-dark to dark washes, and more.abercrombie.comAbercrombie Skinny JeansAbercrombie Curve Love High Rise Super Skinny Ankle Jean ($90) In the market for a pair of comfortable skinny jeans? This Curve Love High Rise Super Skinny Ankle Jean has an additional two inches through the hip and thigh. Not only do these jeans accommodate your curves, but they also make them look even more amazing. These pants shape you in just the right way while still delivering a tailored look. It comes in three washes.-— Additional reporting by India YaffeAnvita Reddy is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and is an avid reviewer of everything including furniture, mattresses, home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She has tried and tested plenty of skin care, makeup, hair care, and countless other beauty products.India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

You can never have enough pairs of comfortable and stylish jeans, and as shopping editors, we're always on the hunt for the best ones. TikTok has been obsessed with Abercrombie's assortment of jeans for quite some time. In fact, the brand gained a whole new crop of fans and admirers after they spotted the brand's Curve Love straight jeans on Francia Raísa's character in "How I Met Your Father." Even our editors are fans of the brand's wardrobe essentials and the new NFL collection, both of which pair beautifully with the brand's denim lineup. If you want to try these fan-favorite jeans for yourself, we curated some of the top styles you need in your closet.

Standout denim styles include the editor-backed '90s straight jeans and mom jeans. The Curve Love collection is also on sale and it has an additional two inches at the hips and thighs, giving you a comfortable yet figure-flattering look that hugs your curves in all the right places. Each pair comes in a variety of washes and designs, too. Whether you're in the market for a crisscross waistband or a distressed look, the list ahead includes all the latest denim trends. These styles also accommodate height with length options ranging from extra short to long.

Ahead, you can shop our favorite denim shorts and timeless jeans from Abercrombie. Some washes and styles are on sale too, so stock up while you can!

Abercrombie High-Rise Shorts

Abercrombie High Rise 4" Mom Short ($50, originally $60)

Available in two denim washes, these mom shorts are perfect for any upcoming vacations. They have a four-inch inseam, which is a flattering length for most heights that strikes a perfect balance between short and long. These shorts are versatile enough to dress up or down so you can wear them at the beach or at brunch.

Abercrombie High-Rise Dad Shorts

Abercrombie Curve Love High Rise Dad Short ($53, originally $70)

If you're looking for something a little longer, these stylish Dad Shorts offer a more relaxed fit with a five-inch inseam. They're available in three denim washes, ranging from light to medium. Pair them with a classic bodysuit, a basic tank or vest top, and layer it with an open button down.

Abercrombie Flared Jeans

Abercrombie High Rise Vintage Flare Jean ($72, originally $90)

Add drama to your denim arsenal with this High Rise Vintage Flare Jean that comes in two washes. These trendy '70s-inspired jeans have a high-rise waistband that is not only flattering, but also helps to elongate the legs. The flared bottoms pair wonderfully with classic sneakers, heels, and booties.

Abercrombie Low-Rise Baggy Jeans

Abercrombie Curve Love Low Rise Baggy Jean ($72, originally $90-$110)

In the market for a flattering pair of low-rise jeans? These have a comfortable, looser fit that feels flexible rather than restricting. Since it's part of Abercrombie's Curve Love line, the jeans will have a figure-hugging fit that eliminates the waist gap. You can style the light-wash denim with a form-fitting bodysuit, a casual cropped T-shirt, or an effortless tank. But, it also comes in a ton of different washes and styles (some of which are discounted).

Abercrombie Mom Jeans

Abercrombie Curve Love High Rise Mom Jean ($72, originally $90)

These Curve Love High Rise Mom Jeans are the ones everyone is talking about, and a bestseller. They're made with a vintage stretch denim, so they'll retain their shape and still feel like classic denim. They're also easy to style and so on trend. You can get them in three washes.

Abercrombie Maternity Jeans

Abercrombie Maternity Ankle Straight Jean ($89)

Finding a pair of maternity jeans that are comfortable without compromising on style is a challenge. This straight jean from Abercrombie has an elastic belly band that helps the fit adjust with your bump as it grows. These jeans are available in a variety of washes and styles, including distressed designs. Get these in extra short, short, regular, and long lengths as well.

Abercrombie High-Rise Straight-Leg Jeans

Abercrombie Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean ($90)

The Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean is perfect for that effortless '90s look. These jeans are an editor favorite for good reason — they sit at your waist and have a built-in stretch that feels comfortable. It comes in a variety of trendy styles like medium with criss-cross waistband, dark destroy, light with vent hem, light with carpenter details, grey, and more. The price varies by style and shade.

Editor Quote:: "I appreciate that these jeans remain supportive (without being restrictive!) throughout the entire wear," one PS editor wrote. The versatile jean can be dressed up or down and comes in a ton of different washes and styles. Read our in-depth review of the Abercrombie Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean.

Abercrombie Loose Jeans

Abercrombie & Fitch High Rise Loose Jean ($90)

Made with a lightweight, rigid denim, these high-rise jeans are inspired by the effortless look of the early aughts. These will deliver an elongated look that's flattering in all the right places. Although they aren't stretchy, these jeans feature a relaxed fit at the waist and hips, as well as a looser leg shape. They come in a wide range of denim washes.

Abercrombie Flattering Curve Love Jeans

Abercrombie Curve Love Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jean ($90)

These are the exact jeans Francia Raisa wore in "How I Met Your Father," and they're trending on TikTok. The Curve Love Ultra High Rise 90s Straight Jeans are exceptionally flattering and comfortable. These jeans have an extra two inches through the hip and thigh to help prevent a waist gap. Get them in a variety of washes and styles, including ones with vent hems or a distressed look.

Abercrombie Mid-Rise Straight Jeans

Abercrombie Curve Love Mid Rise 90s Straight Jean ($90)

A straight jean is a wardrobe staple, and the Curve Love Mid Rise 90s Straight Jean provides comfort with built-in stretch. These mid-rise jeans sit right below the waist, making them ideal for tucked-in shirts and basic tanks and T-shirts. It's available in an array denim washes, ideal for daytime outfits. Pricing reflects the style and shade.

Abercrombie '90s Relaxed Jeans

Abercrombie High Rise 90s Relaxed Jean ($90-$110)

Want to keep up with all the latest trends? These High Rise 90s Relaxed Jeans are worth adding to your collection. They're loose almost throughout the jean, and we love the clean look of this pair. They're made of Abercrombie's vintage stretch denim, which has just a little bit of give yet manages to maintain the tougher, more rigid feel of vintage denim.

Abercrombie High-Rise Skinny Jeans

Abercrombie Curve Love High Rise Skinny Jean ($90)

If you'll never part with your skinny jeans, these Curve Love High Rise Skinny Jeans are the ones worth wearing. Tuck them into tall boots for an elegant, vintage look that seems to be popping up lately. You can shop this style in a wide range of washes like medium destroy, medium-dark to dark washes, and more.

Abercrombie Skinny Jeans

Abercrombie Curve Love High Rise Super Skinny Ankle Jean ($90)

In the market for a pair of comfortable skinny jeans? This Curve Love High Rise Super Skinny Ankle Jean has an additional two inches through the hip and thigh. Not only do these jeans accommodate your curves, but they also make them look even more amazing. These pants shape you in just the right way while still delivering a tailored look. It comes in three washes.

— Additional reporting by India Yaffe

Anvita Reddy is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and is an avid reviewer of everything including furniture, mattresses, home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She has tried and tested plenty of skin care, makeup, hair care, and countless other beauty products.

India Yaffe was an associate editor on the Shopping team at PS for five years. She focused on curating the best fitness, fashion, beauty, and home products on the market for the PS audience.
